name: The Broker
description:
Be the Broker between two cultures forced to live near each and depend on each other to survive. The problem being that you (an off worlder) are the only one able to speak both tongues.

It's A Win-Win Situation.

This is a 2D platformer that forces you to think on your feet as they days pass by and you must keep both civilisations in enough resources to prevent one from starting a resource war with the other.

Created for Start Up Cities Game Jame 2020. 

The theme for this Jam was 'Win-Win' Situation, and given the conflict and loss this year a win was a breath of fresh air, and after about an hour of throwing ideas at a literal wall  we came to the idea of two civilisations that must cooperate to create a 'Win-Win Situation'.

The resulting game is about 80% of what we wanted to implement in to the game with the most jarring admission being any obstacles or enemies between the two towns, adding a bit more variety to the gameplay.

Art produced on ProCreate and Illustrator, Music with BandCamp (I Know...) and all smashed together with tape and bits of string in Unity Engine.

ThankYou To everyone who plays I hope you enjoyed the ideas at play here

-The SpaceBaby Team
